display_long_description:
# *THE #1 VR SOCIAL COLLECTIBLE CARD GAME IS FREE TO PLAY!*
Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!
[media]
# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
[media]
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
[media]
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
[media]
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
[media]

Collect **HUNDREDS OF CARDS**, compete in **EPIC PVP & PVE BATTLES**, and explore our **IMMERSIVE FANTASY HAVENS** which feels like playing cards at your local game shop!

# Unsure About Card Battlers but Love Strategy Games?
Cards & Tankards now has strategy board games you can play with your friends like **CHESS & CHECKERS** with more planned for future updates!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822897_2207211333017644_8618162970932046056_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=VaC4EWEEiLMQ7kNvwFqKZHz&_nc_oc=Admv9uZTxTBWc9JwdExbkXdhGC1VFltrGl9bShKT-i_LcTjTqYu3wJOF5irNDBdQQrY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9FWw5eTh1CxEbQAEwH3fHQ&oh=00_Afs_xV5uFS1ZrshWwCKDdks9NwTX3c4C1VPYO6tbxQvjZg&oe=6995CA61)
# Cracking Packs Has Never Been More Fun!
Experience the thrill of opening booster packs with friends, all without spending a dime! Unlike other CCGs, Cards & Tankards is built around a true **FREE-TO-PLAY** experience.
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499292712_2011949136257433_2240288442270214956_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=DNF3RTVrYZcQ7kNvwHqoMGZ&_nc_oc=Adl53sZiaaxX5SYR4rL3hLLzB_vv3K8RueEABUAwrjmPQ0zSz5OSqyhSbY-xrQ16zFw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9FWw5eTh1CxEbQAEwH3fHQ&oh=00_AfuAYsxDPLhw33nDCYIVL5YdOIqBccE3T1Qq9Xd6NLSHEw&oe=6995C109)
# Become The Best in the World!
Compete in the **RANKED ARENA** to become a Master of Cards & Tankards and have your username featured on the **GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS!**
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/507828918_1952193972016857_1573896307480103320_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=8Oh5ph9FETEQ7kNvwHvnnuY&_nc_oc=AdnXy4NMD9-0nufVGnkGnV0tO1F7O6r4BJnB62y4Q3z6JYOmaVw2TuMhka5qQsYnSQw&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9FWw5eTh1CxEbQAEwH3fHQ&oh=00_Afvaq0g1IPJd3mV9msJunozDhPQ5r6MqNSusrlBk3zuJnQ&oe=6995C992)
# New to CCGs? No Problem!
Cards & Tankards is **EASY TO LEARN**, with friendly players always eager to teach you the basics, share more complex strategies, and raise a tankard to your first victory!
![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/491822813_1735619753788707_6789934812689609528_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=R8bxN2g5CbcQ7kNvwF2RA2m&_nc_oc=AdlvI1SJ8TCgJlqmfXVW6EoKBwz-TceCSlj4kpH-rlpXX_KVh6AI8yqYZt5i6jdlBZY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=9FWw5eTh1CxEbQAEwH3fHQ&oh=00_AftMV7-4ZNUqfnVf5cY5iBRLuM2K4i8qhmT2b5Ukq54Cvw&oe=6995B6D8)
